name: Overhell
description: All started with banal search a group of sadists. You almost caught them but they have already started their rutial which cause uprising of terrible creatures from hell. You have no choice. Try to save your life...
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Look Ma, i've made a game! Why these kids are charging money for this is beyond me.   Positive ratings are maintained by fake reviews. Only grab it with 99% discount for a laugh at how bad something can be and a chance to kill walking triangle :)
Overhell is a game that I recommend because: - is a method to banish boredom - it has a good price - it has action & adventure - it is indie & casual - it has trading cards  Enjoy!
